name: Từ Vựng Bắt Đầu Bằng Chữ: Y (English Vocabulary)

words.example: They spent their vacation sailing on a luxury yacht.

words.vietnamese: kẻ thô lỗ, cục súc (hoặc tiếng reo vui)
words.example: He acted like a yahoo at the party.
The yak is native to the Himalayas.
Baked yams are a delicious side dish.
He yanked the door open in anger.

words.vietnamese: sủa ăng ẳng, nói lảm nhảm
words.example: That little dog yaps all day long.

words.vietnamese: cái sân; thước Anh (đơn vị đo lường)
words.example: The children are playing in the back yard.
She is knitting a scarf with blue yarn.
He yawned loudly because he was bored.

words.vietnamese: vâng, ừ (văn nói thân mật của Yes)
words.example: Yeah, I think that's a good idea.
We wish you a Happy New Year.
I asked my friends to sign my yearbook.
She yearns for a peaceful life in the countryside.
Yeast makes the bread dough rise.
Please don't yell at me.
Sunflowers are bright yellow.

words.vietnamese: kêu ăng ẳng (vì đau), la lên
words.example: The puppy let out a yelp when I stepped on its tail.
Yes, I understand what you mean.
I went to the cinema yesterday.

words.vietnamese: chưa (dùng trong câu phủ định/nghi vấn); tuy nhiên
words.example: I haven't finished my homework yet.

words.vietnamese: sản lượng; nhường đường; đầu hàng
words.example: This farm yields a large harvest every year.
She does yoga every morning to stay flexible.
I usually have yogurt and fruit for breakfast.

words.vietnamese: cái ách (bò); gánh nặng, sự kìm kẹp
words.example: People fought to throw off the yoke of oppression.
Some recipes only use the egg yolk.

words.vietnamese: đằng kia (vị trí xa nhưng nhìn thấy được)
words.example: Look at the beautiful tree over yonder.

words.vietnamese: bạn, anh, chị, ông, bà (ngôi thứ 2)
words.example: How are you today?
He looks very young for his age.
The park provides a place for youngsters to play.
Is this your book?

words.vietnamese: cái của bạn (đại từ sở hữu)
words.example: This pen is mine, and that one is yours.
You have to do it yourself.
The youth of today are very tech-savvy.
She has a youthful spirit.
The cat yowled loudly at night.
He knows many tricks with a yoyo.
Yuck! This food tastes terrible.
The medicine tasted yucky.
We sat by the fire during Yule.
This chocolate cake is yummy.

words.vietnamese: thanh niên chuyên nghiệp thành đạt
words.example: The cafe is full of yuppies working on laptops.
We have a yearly family reunion.
They yearn for freedom.

words.vietnamese: nhượng bộ, đầu hàng trước ai
words.example: He refused to yield to pressure.
The old pages were yellowish.
The price is 1000 Yen.

words.vietnamese: tiểu chủ (nông dân tự canh tác)
words.example: A yeoman farmer owns a small amount of land.

words.vietnamese: những năm tháng trước đây, quá khứ
words.example: Fashion of yesteryear is coming back.
Yippee! We won the game!
The yogi meditated in the cave.
Enjoy yourselves at the party!

words.vietnamese: kính thư (kết thúc thư trang trọng)
words.example: Yours sincerely, John Smith.

words.vietnamese: bạn chân thành của... (kết thúc thư)
words.example: Yours truly, Jane.

words.vietnamese: thước đo, tiêu chuẩn so sánh
words.example: Profit is not the only yardstick of success.
She felt a deep yearning to travel.
This resort is open year-round.

words.vietnamese: nhà trọ giá rẻ (cho giới trẻ du lịch)
words.example: We stayed in a youth hostel to save money.
He wants to become a famous YouTuber.
